- Near the front entry door: object/hardware damaged beside the door. Location: interior side of doorway. Material: unknown from note.
- Roof area: possible roof leak or seal/flashings issue. Location: roofing/ceiling vicinity.
- HVAC: reported problem with the A/C system. Location: central HVAC unit/mechanical area.
- HVAC filter: 16 x 20 filter noted; appears to have been addressed. Location: return air filter.
- General: notes are handwritten in Portuguese; verify items on-site for clarity.
